biotools.summary: IMGT/GeneInfo is the IMGT® tool providing combination (V-J and V-V) information for the human and mouse T cell receptor (TR) loci. Analysis is based on the IMGT-ONTOLOGY concepts.

bioschemas.name: IMGT GeneInfo
bioschemas.summary: IMGT/GeneInfo is the IMGT® tool providing combination (V-J and V-V) information for the human and mouse T cell receptor (TR) loci. Analysis is based on the IMGT-ONTOLOGY concepts.
